What is the source for the video? It says nothing in the nfo. Is it retail? NTSC or PAL? I beg that it is not TC. Does R2 stand for Region 2? That I don't understand, because a Region 2 release should include original English subs.
Japan is also region 2. It's source is a retail japanese dvd.
Thanks. I didn't think about that. I gone get this now. :-)
